duties_responsibilities.duty: Be accountable for the success of relationships with Salesforce and other partnerships
Coordinate launches of integrations/joint solutions with Salesforce and other partners
Engage with strategic customers, partners, and internal stakeholders as the primary point of contact on partnerships
Collaborate with Marketing and Sales teams to build joint go-to-market plans, marketing engines, and sales strategy materials
Drive sales enablement efforts around joint solutions across the global Snowflake sales organization

education_certification.credential: Minimum 7 years of relevant sales, business development, or alliances experience
